page.title: 14 The Community Centre.
page.content: The village community centre uses the old C.of E.school buildings.The building was aquired from the Dryden Family(of poet fame)to whom the village pays a Â£peppercorn'rent and it was officially opened in 1977. A number of organizations use it on a permanent basis.The doctors have a regular surgery there.The County have opened a permanent library which opens twice a week on Mondays and Fridays.There is a Â£day room' for the over 60's and Mrs. Brooks runs her playgroup there.There is a large hall which can be used for wedding receiptions,private parties, dances etc. and an adjoining kitchen has facilities for cooking and food preparation. There is a sliding scale of charges for the hire of this hall.
